001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
006import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
007import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
008import java.nio.charset.Charset;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException;
011import java.util.EnumSet;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Map.Entry;
015import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
016import java.util.ServiceConfigurationError;
017import java.util.ServiceLoader;
018import java.util.Set;
019import java.util.Spliterators.AbstractSpliterator;
020import java.util.function.Consumer;
021import java.util.function.Function;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
024
025import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
026import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
027
028import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
029import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheConfig;
030import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
031import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType.UnspecifiedContentType;
032import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter;
033import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter.UnspecifiedFormatter;
034import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheName;
035import io.jstach.jstache.JStachePath;
036import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
037import io.jstach.jstachio.Output.EncodedOutput;
038import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
039import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateConfig;
040import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
041import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.Html;
042import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.PlainText;
043import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.DefaultFormatter;
044import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.SpecFormatter;
045import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.TemplateInfos.SimpleTemplateInfo;

047/**
048 *
049 * Locates generated templates by their model via reflection.
050 * <p>
051 * This utility class is useful if you plan on implementing your own {@link JStachio} and
052 * or other integrations.
053 *
054 * @apiNote In order to use reflection in a modular setup one must <code>open</code>
055 * packages to the {@link io.jstach.jstachio/ } module.
056 * @author agentgt
057 *
058 */
059public final class Templates {
060
061        private Templates() {
062        }
063
064        /**
065         * A utility method that will check if the templates encoding matches the outputs
066         * encoding.
067         * @param template template charset to check
068         * @param output an encoded output expecting the template charset to be the same.
069         * @throws UnsupportedCharsetException if the charsets do not match
070         */
071        public static void validateEncoding(TemplateInfo template, EncodedOutput<?> output) {
072                if (!template.templateCharset().equals(output.charset())) {
073                        throw new UnsupportedCharsetException(
074                                        "The encoding of the template does not match the output. template charset="
075                                                        + template.templateCharset() + ", output charset=" + output.charset());
076                }
077        }
078
079        /**
080         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
081         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. This method is effectively calls
082         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
083         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config.
084         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
085         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
086         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
087         * not the Templates class</em>)
088         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
089         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
090         * template was found.
091         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
092         */
093        public static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) throws Exception {
094                Logger logger = config.getLogger(Templates.class.getCanonicalName());
095                return findTemplate(modelType, config, logger);
096        }
097
098        /**
099         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
100         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. This method is effectively calls
101         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
102         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config. Unlike
103         * {@link #findTemplate(Class, JStachioConfig)} this call will not produce any logging
104         * and will not throw an exception if it fails.
105         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
106         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
107         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
108         * not the Templates class</em>)
109         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
110         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
111         * template was found or <code>null</code> if not found.
112         */
113        public static @Nullable TemplateInfo findTemplateOrNull(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) {
114                try {
115                        return findTemplate(modelType, config, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
116                }
117                catch (Exception e) {
118                        return null;
119                }
120        }
121
122        static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config, Logger logger) throws Exception {
123                EnumSet<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies = EnumSet.noneOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
124
125                for (var s : ALL_STRATEGIES) {
126                        if (s.isEnabled(config)) {
127                                strategies.add(s);
128                        }
129                }
130                var classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(modelType.getClassLoader());
131
132                Exception error;
133                try {
134                        Template<?> r = Templates.getTemplate(modelType, strategies, classLoaders, logger);
135                        return r;
136                }
137                catch (Exception e) {
138                        error = e;
139                }
140                if (!config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE)) {
141                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.WARNING)) {
142                                logger.log(Level.WARNING,
143                                                "Could not find generated template and will try reflection for model type: " + modelType,
144                                                error);
145                        }
146                        return getInfoByReflection(modelType);
147
148                }
149                throw error;
150
151        }
152
153        /**
154         * Finds template info by accessing JStache annotations through reflective lookup.
155         * <p>
156         * This allows you to lookup template meta data <strong>regardless of whether or not
157         * the annotation processor has generated code</strong>. This method is mainly used
158         * for fallback mechanisms and extensions.
159         * <p>
160         * Why might you need the reflective data instead of the static generated meta data?
161         * Well often times the annotation processor in a hot reload environment such as
162         * JRebel, JBoss modules, or Spring Reload has not generated the code from a JStache
163         * model and or it is not desired. This allows reflection based engines like JMustache
164         * to keep working even if code is not generated.
165         * @param modelType the class that is annotated with {@link JStache}
166         * @return template info meta data
167         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
168         */
169        public static TemplateInfo getInfoByReflection(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
170                return TemplateInfos.templateOf(modelType);
171        }
172
173        /**
174         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
175         * @param <T> the model type
176         * @param clazz the model type
177         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
178         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
179         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
180         */
181        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> clazz) throws Exception {
182                List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(clazz.getClassLoader());
183                return getTemplate(clazz, ALL_STRATEGIES, classLoaders, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
184        }
185
186        /**
187         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
188         * @param <T> the model type
189         * @param modelType the model type
190         * @param strategies load strategies
191         * @param classLoaders class loaders to try loading
192         * @param logger used to log attempted strategies. If you do not want to log use
193         * {@link JStachioConfig#noopLogger()}.
194         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
195         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
196         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
197         *
198         */
199        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> modelType, Iterable<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies,
200                        Iterable<ClassLoader> classLoaders, System.Logger logger) throws Exception {
201
202                for (TemplateLoadStrategy s : strategies) {
203                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.DEBUG)) {
204                                logger.log(Level.DEBUG, "For modelType: \"" + modelType + "\" trying strategy: \"" + s + "\"");
205                        }
206                        for (ClassLoader classLoader : classLoaders) {
207                                try {
208                                        Template<T> template = s.load(modelType, classLoader, logger);
209                                        if (template != null) {
210                                                return template;
211                                        }
212                                }
213                                catch (ClassNotFoundException | TemplateNotFoundException e) {
214                                        continue;
215                                }
216                        }
217                }
218                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
219        }
220
221        static boolean isReflectionTemplate(TemplateInfo template) {
222                if (template instanceof SimpleTemplateInfo si) {
223                        return true;
224                }
225                return false;
226        }
227
228        private static final Set<TemplateLoadStrategy> ALL_STRATEGIES = EnumSet.allOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
229
230        /**
231         * Strategy to load templates dynamically.
232         *
233         * @author agentgt
234         *
235         */
236        public enum TemplateLoadStrategy {
237
238                /**
239                 * Strategy that will try the {@link ServiceLoader} with the SPI of
240                 * {@link TemplateProvider}.
241                 */
242                SERVICE_LOADER() {
243                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
244                        @Override
245                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
246                                        throws Exception {
247                                return (Template<T>) templateByServiceLoader(clazz, classLoader, logger);
248                        }
249
250                        @Override
251                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
252                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.SERVICELOADER_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
253                        }
254                },
255                /**
256                 * Strategy that will try no-arg constructor
257                 */
258                CONSTRUCTOR() {
259                        @Override
260                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
261                                        throws Exception {
262                                return templateByConstructor(clazz, classLoader);
263                        }
264
265                        @Override
266                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
267                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
268                        }
269
270                };
271
272                /**
273                 * Load the template by this strategy.
274                 * @param <T> model type.
275                 * @param clazz model type.
276                 * @param classLoader classload which may more may not be used.
277                 * @param logger used to log reflection warnings or other errors.
278                 * @return loaded template
279                 * @throws Exception if an error happens while trying to load template.
280                 */
281                protected abstract <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
282                                throws Exception;
283
284                /**
285                 * Determine if the strategy is enabled.
286                 * @param config key value config
287                 * @return true if not disabled.
288                 */
289                protected abstract boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config);
290
291        }
292
293        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
294        private static <T> @Nullable Template<T> templateByConstructor(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader)
295                        throws Exception {
296                Class<?> implementation = classLoader.loadClass(generatedClassName(clazz));
297                Constructor<?> constructor = implementation.getDeclaredConstructor();
298                constructor.setAccessible(true);
299                return (Template<T>) constructor.newInstance();
300        }
301
302        /**
303         * Gets the canonical class name of the generated template code regardless of whether
304         * or not code has actually been generated. Because the class may not have been
305         * generated the return is a String.
306         * @param modelClass the exact model class that contains the {@link JStache}
307         * annotation.
308         * @return the FQN class name of the would be generated template code
309         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the model class is not annotated with
310         * {@link JStache}.
311         */
312        public static String generatedClassName(Class<?> modelClass) {
313                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
314                var a = modelClass.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
315                if (a == null) {
316                        throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelClass);
317                }
318                String cname;
319                if (a == null || a.name().isBlank()) {
320
321                        JStacheName name = findAnnotations(modelClass, JStacheConfig.class) //
322                                        .flatMap(config -> Stream.of(config.naming())).findFirst().orElse(null);
323
324                        String prefix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.prefix();
325
326                        String suffix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.suffix();
327
328                        prefix = prefix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
329                        suffix = suffix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
330
331                        cname = prefix + modelClass.getSimpleName() + suffix;
332                }
333                else {
334                        cname = a.name();
335                }
336                String packageName = modelClass.getPackageName();
337                String fqn = packageName + (packageName.isEmpty() ? "" : ".") + cname;
338                return fqn;
339        }
340
341        private static Charset resolveCharset(Class<?> c) {
342                String charset = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).map(config -> config.charset())
343                                .filter(cs -> !cs.isEmpty()).findFirst().orElse(null);
344                if (charset == null) {
345                        return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
346                }
347                return Charset.forName(charset);
348        }
349
350        static <A extends Annotation> Stream<A> findAnnotations(Class<?> c, Class<A> annotationClass) {
351                var s = annotationElements(c);
352                return s.filter(p -> p != null).map(p -> p.getAnnotation(annotationClass)).filter(a -> a != null);
353        }
354
355        private static @NonNull Stream<AnnotatedElement> annotationElements(Class<?> c) {
356                Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> enclosing = enclosing(c).flatMap(Templates::expandUsing);
357                var s = Stream.concat(enclosing, Stream.of(c.getPackage(), c.getModule()));
358                return s;
359        }
360
361        /*
362         * This is to get referenced config of JStacheConfig.using
363         */
364        private static Stream<Class<?>> expandUsing(Class<?> e) {
365
366                JStacheConfig config = e.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
367                if (config == null) {
368                        return Stream.of(e);
369                }
370                var using = config.using();
371                if (!using.equals(void.class)) {
372                        return Stream.of(e, using);
373                }
374                return Stream.of(e);
375        }
376
377        private static Stream<Class<?>> enclosing(Class<?> e) {
378                AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>> split = new AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>>(Long.MAX_VALUE, 0) {
379                        @Nullable
380                        Class<?> current = e;
381
382                        @Override
383                        public boolean tryAdvance(Consumer<? super Class<?>> action) {
384                                if (current == null) {
385                                        return false;
386                                }
387                                var c = current;
388                                current = current.getEnclosingClass();
389                                action.accept(c);
390                                return true;
391                        }
392                };
393                return StreamSupport.stream(split, false);
394        }
395
396        private static <T> @Nullable Template<?> templateByServiceLoader(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader,
397                        System.Logger logger) {
398                ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(TemplateProvider.class, classLoader);
399                return findTemplates(loader, TemplateConfig.empty(), e -> {
400                        logger.log(Level.ERROR, "Template provider failed to load. Skipping it.", e);
401                }).filter(t -> t.supportsType(clazz)).findFirst().orElse(null);
402        }
403
404        /**
405         * Find templates by the given service loader.
406         * @param serviceLoader a prepared service loader
407         * @param templateConfig template config to use for instantiating templates
408         * @param errorHandler handle {@link ServiceConfigurationError} errors.
409         * @return lazy stream of templates
410         */
411        public static Stream<Template<?>> findTemplates( //
412                        ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> serviceLoader, //
413                        TemplateConfig templateConfig, //
414                        Consumer<ServiceConfigurationError> errorHandler) {
415                return serviceLoader.stream().flatMap(p -> {
416                        try {
417                                return p.get().provideTemplates().stream();
418                        }
419                        catch (ServiceConfigurationError e) {
420                                errorHandler.accept(e);
421                        }
422                        return Stream.empty();
423                });
424        }
425
426        private static List<ClassLoader> collectClassLoaders(@Nullable ClassLoader classLoader) {
427                return Stream.of(classLoader, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), Template.class.getClassLoader())
428                                .filter(cl -> cl != null).toList();
429        }
430
431        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
432        static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
433                throw (E) x;
434        }
435
436        /**
437         * Resolve path lookup information reflectively from a model class by doing config
438         * resolution at runtime.
439         * @param model a class annotated with JStache
440         * @return the resolved path annotation
441         * @apiNote This method is an implementation detail for reflection rendering engines
442         * such as JMustache and JStachio's future reflection based engine. It is recommended
443         * you do not rely on it as it is subject to change in the future.
444         */
445        public static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
446                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
447                return annotationElements(model).map(TemplateInfos::resolvePathOnElement).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
448                                .orElse(null);
449        }
450
451        static class TemplateInfos {
452
453                public static TemplateInfo templateOf(Class<?> model) throws Exception {
454                        JStache stache = model.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
455                        if (stache == null) {
456                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
457                                                "Model class is not annotated with " + JStache.class.getSimpleName() + ". class: " + model);
458                        }
459                        @Nullable
460                        JStachePath pathConfig = resolvePath(model);
461                        String templateString = stache.template();
462
463                        final String templateName = generatedClassName(model);
464                        String path = stache.path();
465                        String templatePath;
466                        if (templateString.isEmpty() && path.isEmpty()) {
467                                String folder = model.getPackageName().replace('.', '/');
468                                folder = folder.isEmpty() ? folder : folder + "/";
469                                templatePath = folder + model.getSimpleName();
470                        }
471                        else if (!path.isEmpty()) {
472                                templatePath = path;
473                        }
474                        else {
475                                templatePath = "";
476                        }
477                        if (pathConfig != null && !templatePath.isBlank()) {
478                                templatePath = pathConfig.prefix() + templatePath + pathConfig.suffix();
479                        }
480
481                        // Class<?> templateContentType =
482                        // EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.nullToDefault(stache.contentType());
483
484                        var ee = EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.providesFromModelType(model, stache);
485                        Function<String, String> templateEscaper = ee.getValue();
486                        Class<?> templateContentType = ee.getKey();
487                        String templateMediaType = "";
488                        var jstacheContentType = templateContentType.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
489                        if (jstacheContentType != null) {
490                                templateMediaType = jstacheContentType.mediaType();
491                        }
492                        Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter = FormatterProvider.INSTANCE
493                                        .providesFromModelType(model, stache).getValue();
494
495                        Charset templateCharset = resolveCharset(model);
496
497                        long lastLoaded = System.currentTimeMillis();
498                        return new SimpleTemplateInfo( //
499                                        templateName, //
500                                        templatePath, //
501                                        templateCharset, //
502                                        templateMediaType, //
503                                        templateString, //
504                                        templateContentType, //
505                                        templateEscaper, //
506                                        templateFormatter, //
507                                        lastLoaded, //
508                                        model);
509
510                }
511
512                private static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePathOnElement(AnnotatedElement a) {
513                        var path = a.getAnnotation(JStachePath.class);
514                        if (path != null) {
515                                return path;
516                        }
517                        var config = a.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
518                        if (config != null && config.pathing().length > 0) {
519                                return config.pathing()[0];
520                        }
521                        return null;
522                }
523
524                sealed interface StaticProvider<P> {
525
526                        default @Nullable Class<?> autoToNull(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
527                                if ((type == null) || type.equals(autoProvider())) {
528                                        return null;
529                                }
530                                return type;
531                        }
532
533                        default Class<?> nullToDefault(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
534                                Class<?> c = autoToNull(type);
535                                if (c == null) {
536                                        return defaultProvider();
537                                }
538                                return c;
539                        }
540
541                        String providesMethod(Class<?> type);
542
543                        Class<?> autoProvider();
544
545                        Class<?> defaultProvider();
546
547                        @Nullable
548                        Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache);
549
550                        Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config);
551
552                        default Class<?> findProvider(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) {
553                                @Nullable
554                                Class<?> provider = autoToNull(providerFromJStache(jstache));
555                                if (provider != null) {
556                                        return provider;
557                                }
558                                provider = findAnnotations(modelType, JStacheConfig.class)
559                                                .map(config -> autoToNull(providerFromConfig(config))).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
560                                                .orElse(null);
561                                return nullToDefault(provider);
562                        }
563
564                        default Entry<Class<?>, P> providesFromModelType(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) throws Exception {
565                                var t = findProvider(modelType, jstache);
566                                return Map.entry(t, provides(t));
567                        }
568
569                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
570                        default P provides(Class<?> type) throws Exception {
571                                String provides = providesMethod(type);
572                                var method = type.getMethod(provides);
573                                Object r = method.invoke(provides);
574                                return (P) r;
575                        }
576
577                }
578
579                enum EscaperProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<String, String>> {
580
581                        INSTANCE;
582
583                        @Override
584                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
585                                return UnspecifiedContentType.class;
586                        }
587
588                        @Override
589                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
590                                return Html.class;
591                        }
592
593                        @Override
594                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
595                                return null;
596                        }
597
598                        @Override
599                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
600                                return config.contentType();
601                        }
602
603                        @Override
604                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
605                                JStacheContentType a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
606                                return a.providesMethod();
607                        }
608
609                        @Override
610                        public Function<String, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> contentType) throws Exception {
611                                contentType = nullToDefault(contentType);
612                                if (contentType.equals(Html.class)) {
613                                        return Html.provider();
614                                }
615                                else if (contentType.equals(PlainText.class)) {
616                                        return PlainText.provider();
617                                }
618                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(contentType);
619                        }
620
621                }
622
623                enum FormatterProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<@Nullable Object, String>> {
624
625                        INSTANCE;
626
627                        @Override
628                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
629                                return UnspecifiedFormatter.class;
630                        }
631
632                        @Override
633                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
634                                return DefaultFormatter.class;
635                        }
636
637                        @Override
638                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
639                                return null;
640                        }
641
642                        @Override
643                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
644                                return config.formatter();
645                        }
646
647                        @Override
648                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
649                                JStacheFormatter a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheFormatter.class);
650                                return a.providesMethod();
651                        }
652
653                        @Override
654                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> formatterType) throws Exception {
655                                formatterType = nullToDefault(formatterType);
656                                if (formatterType.equals(DefaultFormatter.class)) {
657                                        return DefaultFormatter.provider();
658                                }
659                                else if (formatterType.equals(SpecFormatter.class)) {
660                                        return SpecFormatter.provider();
661                                }
662                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(formatterType);
663                        }
664
665                }
666
667                record SimpleTemplateInfo( //
668                                String templateName, //
669                                String templatePath, //
670                                Charset templateCharset, //
671                                String templateMediaType, //
672                                String templateString, //
673                                Class<?> templateContentType, //
674                                Function<String, String> templateEscaper, //
675                                Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter, //
676                                long lastLoaded, //
677                                Class<?> modelClass) implements TemplateInfo {
678
679                        @Override
680                        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
681                                return modelClass().isAssignableFrom(type);
682                        }
683
684                }
685
686        }
687
688}
